title: Mirrored Catalog Definition
description: Defines a MirroredCatalog item that mirrors an external Iceberg REST Catalog into Fabric by creating delegated shortcuts to provider storage. Metadata is mirrored; data is not copied.

$schema.description: The schema version of the MirroredCatalog definition.

mountedTables.description: Lists the tables to be mirrored from the source catalog. If not specified, all tables under the namespaceScope will be mirrored and new tables will be automatically added.

SourceProperties.title: Source Properties
SourceProperties.description: Describes the source catalog connection and scope configuration.

type.description: The type of the source catalog provider.

typeProperties.description: Properties for the source connection, such as connectionId, namespaceScope, and warehouse.

SourceType.title: Source Type
SourceType.description: The type of the source catalog. Additional source types may be added over time.

SourceTypeProperties.title: Source Type Properties
SourceTypeProperties.description: Connection and scope properties for the source catalog.

connectionId.description: The connection identifier for the source catalog. Immutable after creation.

namespaceScope.description: The namespace hierarchy path to scope the mirroring. Array of namespace components (e.g., ["Accounting", "US"]). Immutable after creation.

warehouse.description: The warehouse name for credential vending. Required for some providers.

MountedTable.title: Mounted Table
MountedTable.description: Defines a table to be mirrored from the source catalog.

MountedTableSourceProperties.title: Mounted Table Source Properties
MountedTableSourceProperties.description: Source properties for a mounted table.

typeProperties.description: Type properties for the source table.

MountedTableSourceTypeProperties.title: Mounted Table Source Type Properties
MountedTableSourceTypeProperties.description: Schema and table name identifying a table in the source catalog.

schemaName.description: The schema name (leaf namespace) of the source table.

tableName.description: The table name of the source table.
